titleStmt.title: Letter from Thomas Campbell to Mary Anne Read
titleStmt.author: Thomas Campbell

publicationStmt.p: This is a born-digital diplomatic transcription of an unpublished letter.

sourceDesc.p: Written on two sides of a folded sheet of wove paper. JRL labeled this "182".

div.p: I have to express my regret to you for not having answerd your first letter & in answer to your second I am sorry that I can only cordially say that my time is completely ingrossd with literary business--even beyond what my health can well stand, & that is quite out of my power to lend my cooperation to any other publication--

closer.salute:
I remain
with respect
Your obedt Servt,
